statements: TRUNCATE TABLE InsuranceClaims, Payments, PolicyHolders, BlockchainTransactions;
TRUNCATE TABLE PolicyHolders, BlockchainTransactions, InsuranceClaims, Payments;
TRUNCATE TABLE insurance_claims, payments, users, blockchain_transactions, payment_history RESTART IDENTITY;
TRUNCATE TABLE payments, insurance_claims, payment_history, blockchain_transactions, users RESTART IDENTITY;
